channel.title: Lightspeed - Status Page Status - Incident History

item.title: Lightspeed Retail (X-Series) - Error when filtering Inventory count to exclude items
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Inventory Count Exclusion Issue

Summary: The Inventory Count feature is currently experiencing issues preventing the exclusion of items, affecting some X-Series retailers. The team is investigating the issue and working on a resolution.

Feb 27, 06:58 EST
Investigating - We have identified an issue related the Inventory Count not allowing to exclude items, the error "Some of the items weren't excluded. Try again." appears when completing the count, which is affecting some of our (X-Series) retailers. We are working on remediating this and will keep you posted with updates as they come. Thank you for your patience

item.title: Lightspeed Retail (R-Series) scheduled database maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Scheduled Database Maintenance

During this time, vendor catalogs will be unavailable for use. Other R-series functionality will not be affected. Summary: We will be conducting scheduled database maintenance on Tuesday February 27th from 10:30 PM EST to 10:45 EST. This maintenance is essential to ensure the continued performance, reliability, and security of our systems.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 27, 22:30 - 22:45 EST

Feb 23, 15:47 EST
Scheduled - We will be conducting scheduled database maintenance on Tuesday February 27th from 10:30 PM EST to 10:45 EST. This maintenance is essential to ensure the continued performance, reliability and security of our systems. During this time, vendor catalogs will be unavailable for use. Other R-series functionality will not be affected.
We understand the importance of our services to your operations and apologize for any inconvenience this maintenance may cause. Your patience and understanding are greatly appreciated as we work to enhance our systems.

item.title: C-Series is experiencing slowness
item.content:encoded:
Low - Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue affecting merchants using Lightspeed C-Series. A dedicated team is investigating the issue.

Summary: Lightspeed is investigating an issue affecting their C-Series merchants.

Feb 21, 15:34 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 21, 11:04 EST
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Feb 21, 11:04 EST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 21, 08:54 EST
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Feb 21, 08:17 EST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 21, 08:17 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue affecting merchants using Lightspeed C-Series. A dedicated team is investigating the issue.

item.title: Lightspeed Restaurant (K-Series)
item.content:encoded:
```html
[Low] - Lightspeed Payments Australia Reporting Issue

Summary: An issue with reporting discrepancies for some Lightspeed Payments Australia merchants has been identified and a fix is being deployed.
```

Feb 20, 14:23 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. The reporting for affected merchants will be whole starting the 21st and onwards

Feb 19, 12:00 EST
Identified - We have identified an issue regarding fees for some Lightspeed Payments Australia Merchants. Some merchants may experience reporting discrepancies, a fix is being deployed.

item.title: Merchants may be experiencing degraded performance when processing payments
item.content:encoded:
Feb 14, 15:52 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 14, 15:05 EST
Update - The error appears to be resolved and is being monitored. Merchants please review your sales and refund any duplicate sales. There may also be sales that need to be re-entered to confirm the transaction by pressing on the "pending payment resolve" button.

Feb 14, 15:01 EST
Monitoring - The error appears to be resolved and is being monitored. Merchants please review your sales and refund any duplicate sales. There may also be sales that need to be re-entered to confirm the transaction by pressing on the "pending payment resolve" button.

Feb 14, 14:41 EST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Feb 14, 14:36 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Payment reporting not updated for some Hospitality accounts since February 9th
item.content:encoded:
Feb 13, 03:13 EST
Resolved - The issue with Lightspeed Payments has been resolved.

Feb 12, 09:04 EST
Monitoring - We have implemented a fix, the reports are regenerating, this will take a couple of hours before they are visible in the back offices.

Feb 12, 07:58 EST
Identified - We have identified the cause of the Lightspeed Payments issue and a dedicated team of engineers is working on a solution.

Feb 12, 07:37 EST
Update - We have identified the issue affecting Payment reporting. Funding was processed as expected.

Feb 12, 06:00 EST
Investigating - Payment reporting has not been updated for some Hospitality accounts since February 9th. Funding was processed as expected.

item.title: Increased latency authenticating requests
item.content:encoded:
Jan 31, 15:52 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. We apologise for any inconvenience it may have caused you.

Jan 31, 15:44 EST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jan 31, 15:30 EST
Investigating - We are currently experiencing increased latency while authenticating requests. Engineers are currently investigating

item.title: Lightspeed Restaurant (K-Series) - Online ordering
item.content:encoded:
Jan 22, 01:50 EST
Resolved - The investigation would show that there was a brief window of impact to online orders. Impact would have been limited to 5:30 am to 6:00am (UTC). The incident window has now been closed but we will continue to monitor.

Jan 22, 00:47 EST
Investigating - We are investigating an issue affecting online ordering.

item.title: Phone Issues - (K-Series)
item.content:encoded:
Jan 15, 19:56 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 15, 18:05 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue affecting the ability to contact the support team via Phone. In the interim if you have any concerns please reach out via chat. You can do this inside the Lightspeed K series integration by selecting Settings > Support > Chat now.

item.title: Error in authentication requests
item.content:encoded:
Jan 15, 19:34 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 15, 19:15 EST
Monitoring - We identified the root cause, and will now monitor the recovery.

Jan 15, 19:07 EST
Investigating - We're looking into reports of a rise in latency for authentication requests.

item.title: Analytics Data Syncing Degraded Performance
item.content:encoded:
Jan 11, 18:20 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 11, 16:30 EST
Investigating - We have noticed data stopped syncing. Our devs have identified the issue and they are working on a solution.

item.title: Delays in inventory and product counts
item.content:encoded:
Jan 11, 17:07 EST
Resolved - All inventory and product delays have been remediated. Thank you for your patience

Jan 11, 16:48 EST
Identified - We are experiencing delays in background processes regarding inventory and products. We have applied a fix and are monitoring the recovery

item.title: X-Series Reporting Dashboard Error
item.content:encoded:
Jan 1, 01:14 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 1, 00:36 EST
Monitoring - All reports should be up to date, we are monitoring the situation for any discrepancy

Dec 31, 19:40 EST
Update - The Retailer Dashboard page is now loading, however the data in the last 24 hours may be delayed in showing on the report.

We are working on processing the data and will provide another update once reports are up to date.

Dec 31, 19:09 EST
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Dec 31, 17:43 EST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue where the Reporting Dashboard fails to load.

item.title: Delays in inventory and product counts
item.content:encoded:

We expect to be fully recovered within the next hour. Thank you for your patience

item.title: Some retailers are being rate limited
item.content:encoded:
Dec 20, 23:40 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Sorry for any inconvenience it might have caused your.

Dec 20, 23:22 EST
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Dec 20, 23:13 EST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Investigating - We are getting reports from a few merchants being unable to load our pages properly.

item.title: Delays - Inventory Results Outdated / Lagging
item.content:encoded:
Dec 20, 17:56 EST
Resolved - Delays to inventory levels have now fully recovered for the affected (X-Series) retailers. Thank you for your patience

Dec 20, 16:55 EST
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Dec 20, 05:59 EST
Update - It appears inventory levels have recovered for most of the affected (X-Series) retailers. However, there is a small portion of retailers still affected. We are monitoring and will post an update soon

Dec 20, 04:14 EST
Monitoring - We have applied a fix and we are monitoring the recovery. We expect inventory level delays to be fully recovered within the next few hours.

We will keep you posted on any updates. Thank you for your patience

Dec 20, 03:52 EST
Identified - We have identified an issue related to delays in Inventory levels for some of our (X-Series) retailers. We are working on remediating this and will keep you posted with updates as they come. Thank you for your patience

item.title: Partial Settlement/Payout Delay for Payouts on December 19th, 2023
item.content:encoded:
Dec 20, 12:48 EST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 19, 13:15 EST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are now monitoring the issue.

Dec 19, 10:12 EST
Identified - A partial settlement/payout delay for payouts on December 19th, 2023 has been identified for a subset of US/CA Retail merchants. The ability to process is not affected. More updates to come.
